title: 'Families cling to hope' after Swiss resort fire and 'Trump warns Iran'
description: Families' search for loved ones in the aftermath of the Swiss ski resort fire dominates Saturday's papers.
content:
Several front pages feature images of Charlotte Niddam, a French-born teenager who went to school in the UK, after she was named as one of those missing following the fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort on Thursday.

title: Corriedale: Coronation Street and Emmerdale collide in crossover episode to launch scaled-back schedule
description: Characters from Coronation Street and Emmerdale come face-to-face for the first time in Corriedale.
content:
The worlds of TV soaps Coronation Street and Emmerdale will collide - literally - in an explosive crossover episode on Monday, kicking off a revamped but reduced schedule for the shows.

title: Leicestershire officer committed gross misconduct over mushroom foraging report
description: Former PC Christopher Vickers was found to have committed gross misconduct over how he issued and recorded a community resolution report.
content:

title: Man dies after being pulled from sea as search continues for two missing off Withernsea
description: Humberside police confirm death of 67-year-old as rescue operation under way in ‘horrendous conditions’
content:
A man has died as a search continues for two people believed to be missing off Withernsea in the East Riding of Yorkshire.
